frontMatter.title: Area of a trapezoid
frontMatter.description: Write a program to compute area of trapezoid

contentHtml:
Write a program to compute area of trapezoid

Base 1 : 5
Base 2 : 10
Height : 7

Area : 52.5
markdown:
## Write a program to compute area of trapezoid

```txt
Base 1 : 5
Base 2 : 10
Height : 7

Area : 52.5
```
